comment.body: Only just discovered it today, a real godsend.
We're going to be using lots of hubs for our torrent indexer, one per category at least, hope we won't run into any major issues.
I'll be blaming you if Reddit is down again tonight. :)
Woah, this is awesome, combined with a decked-out indexer you're basically all set!
@Kaffie: good stuff! I'm currently working on a full-scale torrents indexer so this is definitely relevant to my interests.
